Alexander Scriabin

Cinq Préludes, op. 15

1895 (nos. 1–3, 5), 1896 (no. 4)

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 6'

  • 1. A major
  • 2. F-sharp minor
  • 3. E major
  • 4. E major
  • 5. C-sharp minor

Recommended editions

  • Collected Works (Muzyka/Jurgenson) · II/8 · Pieces · ed. Valentina Rubtsova / Pavel Shatsky
  • Könemann · K 213 · Preludes I · ed. Victor Ekimovsky
